LanguageData.SkillAndGrace_GracePeriodTip: Number of hours after last usage of a skill before degradation should occur. Set to 0 to disable the effects of this mod.
LanguageData.SkillAndGrace_GreatMemoryTip: A multiplier to the grace period for pawns with the Great Memory trait.
LanguageData.SkillAndGrace_PassionMultiplerTip: A multiplier to the grace period for skills where the pawn has a passion
LanguageData.SkillAndGrace_BurningPassionMultiplierTi: A multiplier to the grace period for skills where the pawn has a burning passion.
